title: BSOD mainly when playing league
body:
Hello,

I have been getting constant blue screens while playing league, sometimes even up to 3 times. Can anyone help me with this? I have updated all drivers, and done all tests on cpu, graphics card, and memory. I have attached the dump files link.

Thanks

replies.body:
What does your BSOD tell you? Which file reports the issue in it? 
Do you have the means to take a photo of it, either from a phone (decent image quality, please) or camera?

It sucks that you're blue screening, and it might be suggesting a pretty serious hardware problem.  Double check your air vents to make sure you're not overheating.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help offer some more solutions as well.  We'll see you there!
